description: Large crowd gatherings, water immersion rituals, noise exposure, chemical colors, and drowning risks.
Firecracker-related burns, respiratory issues due to pollution spike, accidents, and eye injuries.
Chemical color exposure, allergic reactions, alcohol-related injuries, and festival-related trauma.
Long dance events causing dehydration, sprains, and crowd-related injuries.
Polluted air leading to asthma attacks, COPD issues, cardiac stress, and eye irritation.
Community-wide spread of viral fevers due to weather patterns or contaminated water.
Flu spike during winter causing respiratory complications and hospitalization.
Injuries, dehydration, respiratory issues due to large crowds and long hours.
Global viral outbreak causing respiratory illness, lockdowns, overwhelmed hospitals, and social disruption.
